name: Power Of The Sith
Lore: 'Many have experienced the awesome power of the Dark Lord in battle. Few have lived to tell about it.',
Text: 'If your character just won an epic duel, deploy on that character.  Character may not be Disarmed, and is immune to Clash Of Sabers and Sorry About The Mess.  During your control phase, if at a battleground, opponent loses 1 Force.  If this card just lost, place it in Used Pile. (Immune to Control.)',
